entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Ear Falls
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:26 PM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -29.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Ear Falls 9:00 PM CST Thursday 02 February 2023
Temperature: -29.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.4 kPa rising
Humidity: 68 %
Wind Chill: -41
Dewpoint: -33.3°C
Wind: WNW 16 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 37.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 37. Wind chill minus 38 this evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the morning then periods of light snow beginning late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 44 in the morning and minus 28 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 20.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending after midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 20. Wind chill minus 32 in the evening and minus 24 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 02 February 2023
